thread.title: Vin Diesel is ‘Flab and the Furious’ at NYC movie premiere
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel is ‘Flab and the Furious’ at NYC movie premiere - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Vin Diesel is ‘Flab and the Furious’ at NYC movie premiere
text:
Gilbert Carrasquillo/FilmMagic Vin Diesel attends "The Last Witch Hunter" premiere in New York City on Tuesday. Red carpet organizers at the Lowes Lincoln Square premiere of Vin Diesel's new film "The Last Witch Hunter" had one simple rule for reporters: No questions about the 48-year-old star's "Dad Bod."
Talk about ignoring the elephant in the room.
Diesel came under fire over the weekend when candid photos of him hanging out on a Miami hotel balcony - while his gut hung over the railing - went viral.
The photos, thought to be about a week old, showed the once musclebound "XXX" star wearing nothing but shorts during a stay in Florida where he was also spotted dining out at Nobu and chilling out at the Skybar lounge.
He was also seen spotting the night away at The Wall nightclub where he sweated off a few pounds by singing along with tunes the DJ played.
Diesel fired back on Instagram , posting a photo of his own where his beer belly appears to have been miraculously transformed to a six-pack stomach in one week's time.
View Gallery Hollywood's hottest dad bods Related Stories Vin Diesel responds to ‘dad bod’ photo with six-pack abs Vin Diesel reveals softer physique in shirtless photo Diesel: ‘Last Witch Hunter’ helped me through Walker's death Tags: vin diesel
